```py
# create the query vector
xq = text_model.encode(query).tolist()

# now query
xc = index.query(xq,
                filter= {
                "year": {"$in":years_filter},
                "month": {"$in":months_filter}
                        },
                top_k= top_k,
                include_metadata=True)
```
